articles.author: Heard Editors, Patrick Thomas, Gavin Bade, WSJ Staff, Corrie Driebusch, Peter Rudegeair, Joe Flint, Ryan Dezember, Anna Wilde Mathews, Laura Cooper, Christopher Kuo, Jesse Newman, Rebecca Feng, Alexander Osipovich, Chelsey Dulaney, Jon Kamp
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Nasdaq Slumps Again as Jobs Data Collides With Tech Selloff — Live Updates - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Follow along for live updates on markets and the top finance, economics and business stories. Plus the latest on the Dow, S&P 500 and Nasdaq.
articles.content:
Investor jitters about tech stocks and the health of the U.S. labor market sent stocks lower Thursday.
The Dow industrials dropped 593 points, or 1.2%, while the S&P 500 also lost 1.2%. The Nasd… [+1543 chars]

articles.title: Google hints at big AirDrop expansion for Android "very soon" - Ars Technica
articles.description: AirDrop came to the Pixel 10 last year, and more Android phones will join the party in 2026.
